sub_title: PhD Fellow at TU Delft, Netherlands - Senior Consultant in Water Resources
summary:
✔️Born in Lambayeque, Peru.
✔️Civil Engineer, Master of Science (M.Sc.)
✔️PhD fellow at Delft University of Technology (TU Delft), Netherlands.
✔️Currently appointed as a professor in the Faculty of Civil Engineering of the University of Applied Sciences (UPC) and the National University of Altiplano in Peru.
✔️Editor of the journal "Revista hidrolatinoamericana" of The International Association for Hydro-Environment Engineering and Research (IAHR)
✔️Postgraduate specialization in Climate Change and Numerical Modelling of Oceans at The First Institute of Oceanography (FIO), China and in Flood Modelling at IHE-Delft Institute, The Netherlands.
✔️Experience conducting studies for projects of fluvial hydraulics, sediment management in rivers and coasts, disaster risk management. Experience designing dams, water intakes, drainage systems, hydroelectric power plants, drinking water and sanitation works.
✔️Advanced skills in hydraulic hydrological modelling and programming in topics related to atmospheric sciences, climate change and hydrology.
✔️Relevant experience in numerical modelling of coasts, rivers, interaction with hydraulic structures, landslides and debris flows using software such as FLOW3D, ANSYS CFX, ANSYSFLUENT, OpenFOAM, FLOW-3D, RIVER2D, CCHE2D, AQUAVEO-SMS, SWMM, FLO-2D, RAMMS, TUFLOW, FEFLOW, RVRMeander, HEC-RAS, TELEMAC 2D, HEC-HMS, MIKE21, MIKE11, Programming skills in Visual C++, Borland C, MATLAB, R Studio, Python languages.
✔️Founding member of the Peruvian Association of Hydraulic and Environmental Engineering (APIHA), active member of the International Association of Engineering and Hydro-environmental Research (IAHR) as part of the River Hydraulics Committee. Scientific Reviewing Committee of the Second World Congress of Young Professionals IAHR 2021.
✔️Founder and current president of the Peruvian Association of Free Software for Science and Engineering (OpenCAE Peru) and the Peruvian Association of Python Programming (Python Peru). ✔️Vice-president of the Peruvian Association of Programming in R (R Users Peru). Specialist and instructor in the area of geospatial analysis, machine learning and data science in environmental applications, water science and engineering.
✔️Speaker, lecturer and panelist for more than 13 years in national and international conferences. 
📧Contact e-mail for academic issues: J.I.MontenegroGambini@tudelft.nl/jmontenegrog@uni.edu.pe/jmontenegrog@pucp.edu.pe/jumonten@vub.be
📧Conctact e-mail for work and consultancy: jmontenegrog@wassereng.com

profile_positions.description:
Delta Urbanism research group
Research topic: Spatiotemporal urban flood risk assessment in support for water-sensitive planning and design
https://deltaurbanism.org/
profile_positions.title: PhD (Doctor of Phylosophy) Fellow

profile_positions.description: Main consultant and Author in Peru for the Next World Small Hydropower Development Report. This report is a triennial joint publication of ICSHP and the United Nations Industrial Development Organization and aims to provide in-depth information on small hydropower development across regions. The previous edition of the report comprised 166 country chapters, 20 regional summaries and 18 case studies and has been a product of the successful collaboration between UNIDO, ICSHP and over 200 experts.
profile_positions.title: Expert Author - World Small Hydropower Development Report

profile_positions.description:
Associated Researcher and Supervisor of master thesis in the programme of disaster management: http://blogs.mat.ucm.es/mgd/
Implementation of physically-based numerical models (RAMMS) to study debris flow runouts and hazard mapping. Ongoing research on GLOF`s (Glacier Lake Outburst flood) in two Peruvian glaciers. Ref.Contact: Prof. José Ubeda Palenque (joseubeda@ucm.es)
profile_positions.title: Associated Researcher - Supervisory Team - Speleology and Mountain Guides

profile_positions.description: Professor of the faculty of civil engineering in the University of Applied Sciences of Peru (UPC)
profile_positions.title: Professor: Faculty of Civil Engineering

profile_positions.description:
Consultancy services in water resources, hydraulics, hydrology and climatology studies.
Working remotely providing services to Latin America on behalf of Wasser World Ltd.

🌐www.wassereng.com
In Wasser World ltd. we are intensely dedicated to the conception and development of engineering projects in the areas of water resources, geology, infrastructure, mining and the environment; as well as the development of studies on various technical scales and relative research forging extensive experience and good performance in their activities by their professional staff. It is also dedicated to providing courses, workshops and training related to computational tools, ICTs, engineering fields and software development.

company.name: Peruvian Free Open-Source  Software Association - OpenCAE Peru

profile_positions.company: Asociación Peruana de Software Libre para ciencias e Ingeniería - OpenCAE Perú
profile_positions.description:
OpenCAE Peru promotes the dissemination, academic formation and research in the area of computer aided engineering (CAE) using free and open source software to study physical phenomena, formulate calculation algorithms, develop software on a par with R + D + I projects.
Fields:
✓ Free and open-source software development and academic formation in science and engineering.
✓Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD).
✓ Numerical methods in engineering.
✓ Optimization of industrial and engineering processes.

profile_positions.description: Due to the current growth in science and technology, the development of programming languages is essential for the optimization of activities from everyday life, university and business. With a sufficient critical mass we find it necessary to generate an association of professionals and academics who are involved in the dissemination, teaching, work and research in the Python in an association whose purpose is to integrate all disciplines that have solved many problems and have given effectiveness to their work with this programming language, promoting technological culture.
